name: Tuba
text: This laptop is FAST. I have a dual XEON server for editing video but am finding myself doing more and more work on this laptop. Because It’s also very fast at editing video.

name: istiak
text: worth the money, coming from an old frankenstien'd PC to this was like a dream come true. its very fast and can play pretty much anything current at max settings

name: salafy
text: I was scared from the comments that this machine was not what is advertised, but when it arrive i checked and everything was in order. the 1tb disk, the 16gb RAM and RTX 3060.

name: Shahriar
text: I didn't pay attention to this brand until recently. No issues. Battery can't be taken off and not sure about batter life yet. Haven't tried gaming. I installed Linux Pop os and wiped windows. It runs like lightning. Love it. My next phone I probably will choose ASUS.

name: Rita
text: I absolutely love this laptop. I use it for work. I wish I could find a spare power cord for it though. I always buy an extra but so far I can’t find.

name: Anika
text: I loved how fast this laptop boots up. The specs are amazing for the price. Love the RGB keyboard. Webcam quality sucks though but its a good trade-off all in all.
